solution_line_template: Oscar needs to increase his maximum running time from {goal_miles} - {current_miles} = <<{goal_miles}-{current_miles}={miles_to_increase}>>{miles_to_increase} miles.
Oscar will need a total of {miles_to_increase} / ( {weekly_increase} ) = <<{miles_to_increase}/({weekly_increase})={weeks_needed}>>{weeks_needed} weeks to prepare.
